hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin Amir that his father had told him that he had seen the Prophet (ﷺ) praying Nawafil at night on the back of his Mount on a journey, facing whatever direction it took

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ تَطَوَّعَ فِي السَّفَرِ فِي غَيْرِ دُبُرِ الصَّلَوَاتِ وَقَبْلَهَا
chapter.eng-name: Whoever offered Nawafil not after the compulsory Salat but before it
